footer.legalDisclaimer: REQUIRED LEGAL DISCLAIMER: Trading foreign exchange, indices, or commodities carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. The high degree of leverage can work against you as well as for you. Before deciding to trade, you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose.

liqScan.hero.title: LiquidityScan
liqScan.hero.subtitle: Deep-Dive Trading
liqScan.hero.description: Stop guessing where the smart money is moving. Access institutional-grade tools to scan, track, and execute on high-probability liquidity zones.
liqScan.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
liqScan.faq.a1: Absolutely. While the tools are professional-grade, our Academy provides step-by-step training to help you understand every indicator and strategy from scratch.
liqScan.faq.a2: We currently support 42 Major & Minor Forex pairs, Gold (XAUUSD), and over 500+ Cryptocurrencies.
liqScan.faq.q3: Do I need a paid TradingView account?
liqScan.faq.a3: No, our indicator works perfectly on the free version of TradingView, though more advanced charting features may require their pro tiers.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.label: Feature Spotlight
liqScan.featureSpotlight.pattern.title: SE Pattern Detection
liqScan.featureSpotlight.pattern.content: Find SuperEngulfing setups instantly. Our algorithm removes the noise and shows you only the best institutional trades in real-time.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.pattern.p1Desc: Instant analysis across M1 to Monthly.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.pattern.p3Desc: The system automatically filters out fake moves.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.rsi.title: RSI Divergence Engine
liqScan.featureSpotlight.rsi.subtitle: Expose hidden momentum shifts
liqScan.featureSpotlight.rsi.contentDesc: Spot market reversals early. Our system tracks Regular and Hidden divergences across all timeframes to give you the fastest entry signals.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.rsi.p2Desc: Get notified via Discord or Mobile instantly.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.rsi.p4Desc: Tune it to your trading style.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.ict.title: ICT Bias
liqScan.featureSpotlight.ict.subtitle: Daily institutional directional bias
liqScan.featureSpotlight.ict.contentDesc: Trade with the institutional trend. Our system analyzes the opening price, Asian range, and midnight open to predict today's move.
liqScan.featureSpotlight.ict.p3Desc: Matches price action to standard ICT templates.
liqScan.pricing.sectionSubtitle: Join the elite 5% of traders using data-driven insights.
liqScan.pricing.freeSubtitle: Essential tools for the casual trader.

book.blueprint.ch5Item2: Building a system that works without you

book.testimonials.quote: "Finally a trading book that doesn't fluff the content. Straight to the point. No 'get rich quick' nonsense, just pure data-driven strategy. The risk management section alone is worth 100x the cover price."
book.testimonials.name: SARAH T.
book.target.title: This Book Is For You If...
book.target.item1: You're tired of getting stopped out before the move
book.target.item2: You've tried SMC/ICT but can't make it consistent
book.target.item3: You want a documented system, not random YouTube tips

book.target.item5: You want strategies you can execute tomorrow
book.sticky.label: Limited Release
book.author.title: About the Author
book.author.para1: "After stepping away from trading, I came back with fresh eyes. While coaching 30+ traders, I noticed something no one was teaching — a clear footprint that shows where smart money is positioned."
book.author.para2: "I documented everything in this book so you don't have to figure it out alone. This isn't theory; it's a battle-tested roadmap derived from millions of market data points."
book.author.name: J. Doe

terms.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
terms.section1.title: ACCEPTANCE OF THE PROTOCOL
terms.section1.content: By accessing the SuperEngulfing website, submitting your email address, or utilizing the proprietary resources provided (including the "SuperEngulfing" TradingView indicator, the "Liquidity Trap" PDF, and the Video Course), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, you are unauthorized to access the SuperEngulfing ecosystem or utilize its proprietary logic in any way apart from using it for your own trading.
terms.section2.title: THE EXCHANGE (ACCESS & CONSIDERATION)
terms.section2.content1: Access to the SuperEngulfing resources is provided on a "Freemium" basis.
terms.section2.content2: The Consideration: In exchange for access to these institutional-grade tools, you agree to provide a valid email address and subscribe to our newsletter/communication channels.
terms.section2.content3: The Deliverables: Upon registration, you are granted a limited, non-transferable, revocable license to:
terms.section2.item1: Download and view the SuperEngulfing PDF Strategy Guide.
terms.section2.item3: Utilize the SuperEngulfing Indicator on the TradingView platform (subject to TradingView’s own Terms of Service).
terms.section3.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY & PROPRIETARY LOGIC
terms.section3.content1: All content provided is the exclusive intellectual property of SuperEngulfing.com owned by Hayk Muradyan.
terms.section3.content2: The Code: The Pine Script logic driving the SuperEngulfing indicator (specifically the REV/RUN logic, Wick Grab detection, and PLUS (+) layer definitions) is proprietary. You may not reverse engineer, decompile, or copy the source code.
terms.section3.content3: The Content: The PDF guide and Video Course are for your personal educational use only. Redistribution, resale, or plagiarism of the "SuperEngulfing" methodology is strictly prohibited.
terms.section3.content4: Enforcement: Any unauthorized distribution of our proprietary logic will result in the immediate revocation of indicator access and potential legal action.
terms.section4.title: RISK DISCLOSURE (NO FINANCIAL ADVICE)
terms.section4.content1: Trading involves a substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor.
terms.section4.content2: Educational Purpose: The SuperEngulfing indicator, PDF, and Course are strictly for educational and informational purposes. They do not constitute financial advice, investment recommendations, or a signal service.
terms.section4.content3: No Guarantees: While the SuperEngulfing logic (REV/RUN) creates high-probability setups based on historical market structure, past performance is not indicative of future results.
terms.section4.content4: User Responsibility: You acknowledge that you are solely responsible for your trading decisions. SuperEngulfing assumes no liability for any financial losses incurred while using our tools or strategies (including the Strategies Playbook).
terms.section5.title: TRADINGVIEW INDICATOR ACCESS
terms.section5.content1: Platform Dependency: Access to the indicator requires a valid TradingView account. We are not affiliated with TradingView and cannot guarantee their platform's uptime.
terms.section5.content2: Revocation Rights: We reserve the right to remove your access to the SuperEngulfing indicator at any time, without notice, should we detect abuse, sharing of access, or violation of these terms.
terms.section6.title: PRIVACY & DATA USAGE
terms.section6.content1: The Vault: We respect the sanctity of your data. Your email address is collected solely for the purpose of delivering the requested resources and providing you with further intelligence regarding SuperEngulfing updates, market analysis, or product offers.
terms.section6.content2: No Third-Party Sales: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal identification information to others.
terms.section7.title: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
terms.section7.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, SuperEngulfing and its officers shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use or inability to use the website, the indicator, or the educational materials.
terms.section8.title: GOVERNING LAW
terms.section8.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.acknowledgment.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENT
terms.acknowledgment.content: By clicking "Submit," "Download," or "Get Access," you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions.
privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.intro: At SuperEngulfing.com, we operate under a "Privacy First" philosophy. This policy outlines how we handle your information when you access the SuperEngulfing ecosystem.
privacy.section1.title: DATA COLLECTION (THE VAULT)
privacy.section1.content1: We only collect the information necessary to provide you with our proprietary trading resources.
privacy.section1.content2: Personal Information: This includes your name and email address, provided voluntarily when you register for the "Freemium" tools (Indicator, PDF, or Course) and the weex.com UID.
privacy.section1.content3: Technical Data: We may collect non-identifying information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information to ensure the security of our proprietary logic and to prevent unauthorized access.
privacy.section2.title: HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION
privacy.section2.content1: Your data is used strictly for the following purposes:
privacy.section2.item1: Access Management: To whitelist your TradingView username and provide access to the SuperEngulfing indicator.
privacy.section2.item2: Intelligence Updates: To send you the "Liquidity Trap" PDF, video course links, and periodic market analysis or product updates.
privacy.section2.item3: Security: To monitor for "leaks" or unauthorized sharing of our proprietary Pine Script logic.
privacy.section3.title: DATA PROTECTION & SHARING
privacy.section3.content1: No Third-Party Sales: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal identification information to marketing firms or third parties.
privacy.section3.content2: Service Providers: We may use trusted third-party service providers (such as email delivery platforms) to help us operate our business, provided those parties agree to keep your information confidential.
privacy.section3.content3: Legal Requirements: We will only disclose your information if required by law or to protect our intellectual property rights against piracy or plagiarism.
privacy.section4.title: COOKIES & TRACKING
privacy.section4.content: Our website may use "cookies" to enhance your user experience. You may choose to set your web browser to refuse cookies, though some parts of the SuperEngulfing ecosystem may not function properly as a result.
privacy.section5.title: THIRD-PARTY LINKS
privacy.section5.content: The SuperEngulfing indicator is hosted on TradingView. While we provide the script, your usage of their platform is governed by TradingView's own privacy policy. We recommend reviewing their terms before utilizing the indicator.
privacy.section6.title: YOUR RIGHTS & OPT-OUT
privacy.section6.item1: Unsubscribe: You may opt-out of our newsletter at any time using the link at the bottom of our emails.
privacy.section6.item2: Data Deletion: You may request that we delete your email from our records. Please note that deleting your data will result in the immediate revocation of your license to the SuperEngulfing indicator and video materials.
privacy.section7.title: CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
privacy.section7.content: SuperEngulfing has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the "Effective Date" at the top of this page.
privacy.consent.title: CONSENT
privacy.consent.content: By using our website and resources, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.section1.title: GENERAL RISK DISCLOSURE
disclaimer.section1.content1: Trading foreign exchange and other financial instruments carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. The high degree of leverage can work against you as well as for you. Before deciding to trade, you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite.
disclaimer.section1.content2: The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment; therefore, you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose.
disclaimer.section2.title: NO FINANCIAL ADVICE
disclaimer.section2.content1: The SuperEngulfing indicator, "Liquidity Trap" PDF, Video Course, and all related materials provided by SuperEngulfing (collectively, "the Materials") are for educational and informational purposes only.
disclaimer.section2.content2: SuperEngulfing is not a registered investment advisor or broker-dealer. No part of the Materials should be construed as financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. Any trades placed based on the logic or setups described in the SuperEngulfing Protocol are taken at your own risk.
disclaimer.section3.title: PERFORMANCE & BACKTESTING
disclaimer.section3.content1: While the SuperEngulfing logic (including REV/RUN and Wick Grab detection) is designed to identify high-probability market structures:
disclaimer.section3.content2: Hypothetical Performance: Results based on historical data have inherent limitations and do not represent actual trading.
disclaimer.section3.content3: No Guarantees: Past performance is not indicative of future results. There is no guarantee that any strategy discussed will result in profits or prevent losses.
disclaimer.section4.title: INDEMNIFICATION
disclaimer.section4.content: By using these tools, you agree that SuperEngulfing and its team members are not responsible for your trading results. You are solely responsible for your own "due diligence." Under no circumstances shall SuperEngulfing be held liable for any direct or indirect loss resulting from the use of the SuperEngulfing indicator or educational resources.
disclaimer.section5.title: TECHNOLOGY & PLATFORM RISK
disclaimer.section5.content: The SuperEngulfing indicator is hosted on TradingView. SuperEngulfing is not responsible for platform outages, technical glitches, or data inaccuracies provided by third-party charting software.
disclaimer.acknowledgment.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENT
disclaimer.acknowledgment.content: By utilizing any resources provided by SuperEngulfing, you acknowledge that you have read this Disclaimer and fully understand the risks associated with financial trading.
